name: TreasHeart
description:
Hey ! You Egyptian !

I know you lost your love and that's why in this journey you will try to resurrect him / her by finding all the Canope Vases...

Trust me ! You don't care about death (Because only the player care about it ;) )

You will have to resolve 16 Puzzle / Platformer levels and  fight 5 bosses !

Hope you will love it ! ;)
